languages.text: {n}Бровь Хейнрикса болезненно изгибается.{/n} "Но так будет всегда, {name}. Эта константа неизменна. Не обманывай себя на сей счет". {n}В его голосе проскальзывает печаль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Бровь Хейнрикса болезненно изгибается.{/n} "Но так будет всегда, {name}. Эта константа неизменна. Не обманывай себя на сей счет". {n}В его голосе проскальзывает печаль.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бровь Хейнрикса болезненно изгибается.{/n} "Но так будет всегда, {name}. Эта константа неизменна. Не обманывай себя на сей счет". {n}В его голосе проскальзывает печаль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希猛地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“但情况始终都是如此，{name}。这个事实永远都不会改变，不要再自欺欺人了。”{n}说出这些话的时候，他的声音中带着悲伤的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希猛地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“但情况始终都是如此，{name}。这个事实永远都不会改变，不要再自欺欺人了。”{n}说出这些话的时候，他的声音中带着悲伤的意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las cejas de Heinrix se arquean bruscamente.{/n} «Pero siempre lo hará, {name}. Es un hecho innegable. En cuanto a eso, le ruego que no se engañe». {n}Pronuncia estas palabras con tristeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las cejas de Heinrix se arquean bruscamente.{/n} «Pero siempre lo hará, {name}. Es un hecho innegable. En cuanto a eso, le ruego que no se engañe». {n}Pronuncia estas palabras con tristeza.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの眉が鋭く吊り上がる。{/n}「しかし、それは常に変わらないんだ、{name}。その事実は決して変わらない。自分を誤魔化さないでくれ」{n}その声音には、悲しさが滲んでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの眉が鋭く吊り上がる。{/n}「しかし、それは常に変わらないんだ、{name}。その事実は決して変わらない。自分を誤魔化さないでくれ」{n}その声音には、悲しさが滲んでいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Mais ce sera toujours le cas, {name}. Vous vous faites des illusions si vous croyez qu'il en sera un jour autrement, » {n}ajoute-t-il avec tristesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Mais ce sera toujours le cas, {name}. Vous vous faites des illusions si vous croyez qu'il en sera un jour autrement, » {n}ajoute-t-il avec tristesse.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Augenbrauen schnellen abrupt hoch.{/n} "Wird er aber, {name}. Das wird sich niemals ändern. Macht Euch diesbezüglich keine Illusionen." {n}Unter seine Worte mischt sich Traurigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Augenbrauen schnellen abrupt hoch.{/n} "Wird er aber, {name}. Das wird sich niemals ändern. Macht Euch diesbezüglich keine Illusionen." {n}Unter seine Worte mischt sich Traurigkeit.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in kaşları hızla çatılıyor.{/n} "Fakat her zaman girecek {name}. Bu gerçek, hiçbir zaman değişmeyecek. Bu konuda kendini kandırmamalısın." {n}Dudaklarından dökülen sözlere keder süzülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyebrows shoot up sharply.{/n} "But it always will, {name}. That fact will never change. Don't delude yourself on that score." {n}Sadness slips into his voice at these words.{/n}
